About the Company: Lancor Holdings Limited is an India-based company. The Company is engaged in the construction and sale of residential properties, construction and leasing of commercial properties. The Companys operation mainly relates to real estate development and its allied activities like property rental, project management, maintenance, brokerage and investing activity. In November 2012, the Company purchased 100% of interest in L&T Commercial Projects Private Limited.
